physical_appearance:This is a photograph of Montgomery Hall in Lahore. There is a path leading up to a large building.  There are two men standing in a porch in front of the bulding. On the right of the picture
 there is a horse carriage with a driver. The building is fronted by four tall columns. The pediment reads \u0027Montgomery\u0027. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of Montgomery Hall in Lahore. There is a path leading up to a large building.  There are two men standing in a porch in front of the bulding. On the right of the picture, there is a horse carriage with a driver. The building is fronted by four tall columns. The pediment reads 'Montgomery'. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
